notes: DIY cosmetics supplier offering Ashwagandha Extract 1619 in glycerin and water base, ready to use in aqueous formulations. Serves DIY cosmetics market, small-scale formulators, and indie brands. Applications: face creams, serums, stress-relief skincare. Small quantities available (50g-1kg) with retail pricing and bulk discounts. USA-based distribution with international shipping. Product information sheets and formulation tips available. Perfect for small-scale testing and indie brand formulation.
